entry.source: {F812}Girl\0{F87A,15}{F813,0,55002}But I'm not complete yet. It's because{F801}everyone has forgotten about me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,55003}I need to be revived for the sake{F801}of them all.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Girl\0{F87A,15}{F813,0,55002}But I'm not complete yet. It's because{F801}everyone has forgotten about me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,55003}I need to be revived for the sake{F801}of them all.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,54002}That girl would like to see you.{F801}She's to the east from here.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,54002}That girl would like to see you.{F801}She's to the east from here.{F801}
